Description: InterVenn® is a clinical technology company leveraging AI-powered software to unlock the value of glycoproteomics to develop transformational healthcare solutions. In this session, we will cover an introduction to glycobiology and the importance of glycoproteomics in cellular functions as it relates to cancer research. We will share some real-world examples of how to leverage the glycoproteome utilizing InterVenn’s proprietary platform called perspectIV(TM). Available now, perspectIV, is a new AI-powered platform to decode and unlock the potential of the glycoproteome with speed, scope, and scale. Please join us to learn more about how to harness the power of interrogating the glycoproteome.
SearchResultBody: ESP06. InterVenn: Translating the Language of Glycoproteomics into Biological Insights and Biomarker Discoveries
Title: InterVenn: Translating the Language of Glycoproteomics into Biological Insights and Biomarker Discoveries
